title: Royal Rajwadi Polki & Onyx Statement Ring
materials: Black Onyx. Features a signature Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster.
features: A bold rectangular design features a central floral motif crafted with ethically sourced polki diamonds in a bezel setting. The backdrop consists of sleek, polished black onyx stones arranged in a geometric pattern. A pave-set border of dazzling diamonds adds a touch of modern glamour. The design seamlessly blends traditional polki craftsmanship with contemporary aesthetics.
colors: Primarily a contrasting color palette featuring the deep black of onyx
the warm yellow of gold settings around the central cluster
the raw shine of the polki diamonds
and the bright white brilliance of the surrounding diamond border. This color scheme creates a rich and luxurious feel.
occasions: or any occasion where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for adding a touch of royal elegance to modern attire
description: This ring showcases the unique beauty of uncut polki diamonds, a gem coveted in South Indian jewelry. The combination of polki diamonds and black onyx creates a striking contrast, while the meticulous craftsmanship and Hyderabadi polish ensure lasting beauty and heirloom quality. This is a unique piece that blends modern and traditional styles perfectly.
